278428.<pc>は 天使長の間に行くため\n聖天舎の２階へ 向かった。:
<pc> headed to the Monastery's
second floor and arrived at the Archangel's
office.

278429.「やあ。\n 天使長に 呼びだされたのかい？: Hey. Did the Archangel summon you?

278430.「キミは あいかわらず 頼りにされているね。\n もっとも 頼れる相手が キミし:
Still reliable as ever, I see. After all,
you're the only one she can depend on... I
suppose those are her true feelings right now.

278431.「四天の星巡りを達成して 神となる資格を得た\n アストルティアの英雄たち……。:
The champions of Astoltia have succeeded in
the Four Heavenly Trials and became qualified
to walk amongst the gods...

278432.「だが 神化の儀は失敗し\n 英雄たちは 悪神と化した。\n ……私とキミの 二:
...but the ritual failed, and the champions
were transformed into fiends. Except for two
of them...you and I.

278433.「ふふっ。私が 儀式の場に\n 姿を現さなかった 理由を知りたい……\n そんな:
Hehe...I can see it in your face...you want to
know why I didn't show up to the ritual.

278434.「その答えは……いずれ わかるさ。\n キミは キミのなすべきことを するといい:
The reason for that is...well, you'll just
have to wait and see. For now, just do what
you have to do.

278435.「そうだ。ここで 私と会ったことは\n 内密にしておいてくれると 助かるよ。:
Oh, and...I'd appreciate it if you kept this
little meeting a secret between us.

278437.「よく来てくれたね <pc>。\n 察しているだろうが お前を呼びだしたのは\n:
I'm glad you came, <pc>. As I'm sure
you've guessed, I called you here because of
developments regarding the ritual.

278438.「我々がおこなった 神化の儀により\n 英雄たちは 神ではなく 悪神と化した。:
The deification ritual that was performed
turned our champions not into gods, but
into fiends instead.

278439.「お前のおかげで ラダ・ガートの魂だけは\n 回収することができたが 他の悪神た:
Thanks to your efforts, I was at least able to
recover Lada Gart's soul...as for the others,
they've all disappeared...

278440.「あれから 我々は\n 悪神たちのゆくえを追うと共に 神化の儀の\n 失敗の原因:
Since then, we've been investigating the
reason why the ritual failed as well as the
whereabouts of the other fiends.

278441.「その過程で こいつを 見つけたのさ。: And while doing so, I found these.

278442.「神化の儀とは……四天の星巡りを突破し\n 魂の燭台に すべての炎を灯らせた 英:
The deification ritual is a rite of ascension for a champion's soul to divine heights, after passing the Four Heavenly Trials and
all of the candles on their Soul Candelabra are lit.

278443.「英雄たちが 魂の燭台を 神化の光炉にささげ\n そこから生まれた 神化の炎を:
The champions then offer their Soul Candelabras to the Furnace of Deification. By accepting the Flame of Deification that
appears unto themselves, they then become gods.

278444.「この ２つの黒い宝石は 神化の光炉から\n 見つかったんだ。調べたところ こい:
These two black stones were found inside the
Furnace. When we investigated further, we
found they had a curse placed upon them.

278445.「おそらく 神化の儀を失敗させたい 何者かが\n あらかじめ 神化の光炉に\n:
Perhaps someone who wanted to ritual to fail
had planted these stones in advance inside
the Furnace.

278446.「そして 英雄たちが 魂の燭台を\n 光炉に投げ込んだ際に その呪いが発動し\n:
And when the champions threw their candelabras
into the Furnace, the curse was triggered and
the Flames of Deification were tainted...

278447.「呪われし 神化の炎……呪炎を取り込んだ\n 英雄たちは 悪神となってしまった。:
The champions who accepted these cursed flames
became fiends. That must be the reasoning
behind this whole ordeal.

278448.「この宝石は 悪神の火種とでも 呼ぼうか。\n 何事も わかりやすいのが イチバ:
I think I'll call these stones the "Fiend's Kindle".
It's best when things are easy to understand.

278449.「……悪神の火種を使って 神化の儀を失敗させた\n 犯人は まだ 見つかっていな:
...the culprit who used these to ruin the
ritual has yet to be identified. We are
thoroughly investigating who it may be.

278450.「さて ここからが 本題なのだが……\n じつは 最近 アストルティアの各地で\:
Now, let's get down to business...recently,
there have been strange phenomena occurring
in various regions of Astoltia.

278451.「これらは 下界に降りた 悪神たちが\n 引き起こしたものではないかと 考えてい:
I believe these phenomena were caused by none
other than the fiends. If left unchecked, they'll
surely bring about terrible destruction.

278452.「ただでさえ 強大な英雄たちが 悪神と化した。\n 並の者では 太刀打ちできまい:
Our mighty champions have been transformed into terrible fiends. No ordinary mortals can hope to stand any chance against them. You are the
only one we can rely on now.

278453.「<pc>。悪神たちの呪いを解き\n 元の 誇り高き英雄に 戻してほしい。\n:
I want you to break the fiends' curse and
restore them to their former glory. Will
you do this for me?<yesno><close>

278454.「ふむ？ 断られた気がしたが……四天の星巡りを\n 突破したほどの英雄が アスト:
Hmm? I thought you might say no, but...there's no way a champion who surpassed the Four Heavenly Trials would overlook such a terrible
crisis in Astoltia... I must have misheard.

278455.「うん。さすがは 選ばれし英雄だ。\n ぜひ お前のチカラを 貸しておくれ。:
Good. I knew I could count on our chosen
champion! Please lend us your strength.

278456.「無論 お前ひとりに 押し付ける気はない。\n 協力者として 天星郷の者も 同行:
Of course, I wouldn't impose this task on just
you alone. I've arranged someone to come along
with you... Okay, you can come in!

278457.「アストルティアでの任務……\n 私も 同行させていただきます。\n よろしくお:
I shall accompany you in your mission in
Astoltia. Let's do our best, shall we?<yesno><close>

278458.「なっ なぜです……はっ！？\n もしや 私が誰か わからないのでしょうか。\n:
B...but why...?! Don't you recognize me?
It's me, Yuliza! I'm just without my wings for
now.

278459.「ふふっ。\n 必ずや あなたの お役に立ってみせます！: Hehe. I promise I won't let you down!

278460.「ユーライザは 翼を隠して 同行する。\n 天使の実在を知らぬ アストルティアの:
Yuliza shall accompany you with her wings
hidden. We do not want to cause any
unnecessary surprise to those down below.

278461.「では 悪神への対処法を 説明しよう。\n 神化の儀から 日が たってしまったせ:
Now I'll explain how to deal with the fiends. Since it's been some time since the deification ritual, it is likely that their
curse is continuing to grow.

278462.「ラダ・ガートは 悪神となり 間もなかったから\n 打ち倒すだけで 呪いが解けた:
Lada Gart was only a fiend for a short time,
so a mere defeat was able to break his curse.
Sadly, we can't rely on that method.

278463.「だが 打つ手は ある。\n ……ここにね。:
But there is way to beat it...
...take a look.

278464.「……神剣レクタリス。\n これを 受け取ってくれ。: Lectalis, the Divine Sword. Please take it.

278465.<pc>は\n神剣レクタリス（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Divine Sword Lectalis (Key Item)!<me 60>

278466.「先に 悪神化の呪いの詳細を 説明しよう。\n この呪いは 英雄たちの記憶や 心:
First, I'll tell you about the fiends' curse. It interferes with the memories and emotions of our champions, which fuels their anger
and hatred.

278467.「まずは 悪神の 荒ぶる心……怒りや憎悪を\n 鎮めるんだ。その方法に これが正:
You'll have to calm their hearts of rage
before doing anything else. There is no right
way to do so, so do what you can.

278468.「怒りや憎悪が鎮まれば 悪神化の呪いは弱まる。\n その時こそ お前に渡した\n:
When their anger and hatred subside, the curse
will weaken. That's when the sword I gave you
comes into play.

278469.「呪いが弱体化した 悪神を\n 神剣で斬りつければ 呪炎を切り離せる。\n つま:
If you strike the fiend with the divine sword
with their curse weakened, you can sever the
cursed flame. It will completely vanish.

278470.「とまあ いろいろ言ったが……とりあえずは\n アストルティアで 異変を起こして:
I know I've talked quite a bit...but for now,
you should locate where each of the fiends
are causing trouble.

278471.「ドルワーム王国 風の町アズラン\n そして ジュレットの町……この３か所で\n:
Dolworm Kingdom, Azlan, and Julet...I'd like
you to begin by investigating the phenomena
in these three locations.

278472.「どの場所から始めても 構わないからね。\n では <pc> ユーライザ 頼んだ:
I don't care which of the three you start
first...and Yuliza, please help
<pc>.

278473.<pc>と ユーライザは\n天使長の間を 後にした。:
<pc> and Yuliza left the
Archangel's office.

278474.「<pc>！\n さっそく アストルティアに……はっ！？:
<pc>! We should head quickly to
Astoltia...huh?!

278475.「ごめんなさい。私……長く留守にするというのに\n 当然 しておくべきことを 忘:
I'm sorry...I forgot to take care of
important things before leaving here.

278476.「申し訳ありません <pc>。\n アストルティアへ 出発する前に\n 私の部屋:
I hate to ask, but...before you leave for
Astoltia, would you please meet me in my
room...?

278477.「なぜ 天使長は 私たちを こんな場所に\n 呼びだしたのでしょう…………: Why did the Archangel call us to this place...

278478.「……ヘルヴェルお姉様！\n どうして こちらに？: Sister Helvel! What are you doing here?

278479.「天使長の命でな。お前たちが持ち帰った\n 悪神の火種を 受け取りに来たのだ。:
By order of the Archangel. I am here to
receive the Fiend's Flame that you have
brought back.

278480.「強力な呪物ゆえ 暴発することも考えられる。\n 受け取り次第 そのまま ひとけ:
It is a powerful spell, and it could go off.
We have been instructed to destroy it in this
deserted area as soon as we receive it.

278481.「なるほど そういうことでしたか。\n 悪神の火種でしたら こちらに…………:
I see. So that's how it is. If it's Fiend's
Flame, I have them here...

278485.「……儀式のため 天の聖壇へ向かう途中で\n 悪い予感がしたのでね。未来を予知し:
...as I was on my way to the Heavenly Altar for the ritual, I had a bad premonition. I tried to foretell the future, but I saw
nothing, as if it were painted black.

278486.「だから 儀式は受けず 様子を見ていただけさ。\n ……そのせいで 天星郷の天使:
That's why I didn't take part in the ritual.
...although I guess that made the angels in
Heaven suspect that I was the culprit.

278487.「英雄たちの悪神化と あなたは 無関係だという\n その言葉を 信じたとして……:
Even if I were to take your word that you had nothing to do with the heroes' demonization... what have you been doing
out of sight all this time?

278488.「アストルティアで キミたちが\n キミたちの なすべきことを していたように\:
Just as you did what you had to do in
Astoltia, I will do what I have to do...

278489.「天星郷を練り歩き 一連の事件についての\n 真相を 探っていた。:
I was walking around Heaven, trying to get
to the bottom of a series of incidents.

278491.「<cs_pchero>が 天星郷に到着した直後に\n 魂の燭台を 紛失したこと:
The loss of the Soul Candle shortly after arrived in Heaven. The God Beast's transformation that took place in the
Deep Green Trials.

278492.「みそぎをおこなう 浄罪の泉の 汚染。\n 神代の遺構における 天使アルビデの:
The pollution of the Spring of Purity where the purification ceremony is held. The suspicious death of Angel Albide at the
Ancient Remains. The Deification Ceremony's failure...

278493.「これら 全てのことさ。\n 私は 一連の事件が ひとつの意思のもとに\n 引き:
All of this. I have discovered that a series
of events have been brought together with a
single intention.

278494.「まるで 別々の出来事にしか 思えないな。\n <cs_pchero>が 魂の燭:
Seems like separate events to me. That
<cs_pchero> lost the Soul Candle is not even
an incident, just an accident, right?

278495.「いいや そうではない。\n <cs_pchero>は 犯人に 襲われたんだよ。:
No, it's not. <cs_pchero> was attacked by
the culprit. As a result, they lost their
Soul Candle.

278496.「そんな……本当だとしたら 許せません！\n ですが 犯人は なぜ そんなことを:
If that's true, it's unforgivable! But why
would the culprit do such a thing?

278497.「襲撃の理由は……\n 今 キミたちが持っている 悪神の火種にある。:
The reason for the attack... is the Fiend's
Flame you now carry.

278498.「５人の英雄から 回収された ５つの火種。\n つまり 英雄を悪神に 変えるには:
Five sparks recovered from five heroes. So it
takes one Fiend's Flame per hero to turn a
hero into a fiend.

278499.「悪神の火種を 神化の光炉に 仕込んだ犯人は\n あらかじめ 用意していたはずだ:
Whoever planted Fiend's Flame in the Fiery
Furnace of Divinity had to have prepared it in
advance. The sparks for nine people.

278500.「９人？\n いえ 天星郷に招かれた 英雄は\n 全部で １０人…………:
Nine? No, there are ten heroes in all invited
to Heaven...

278501.「もしや……<cs_pchero>？ じつは あなたを\n 招くべきという 私の:
What if...<cs_pchero>? As a matter of fact,
my plea to invite you was granted just before
the Four Heavenly Trials began!

278502.「本来ならば 生者を 天星郷に迎えることは\n ありません。<cs_pchero:
Normally, we would not welcome the living to Heaven. Despite the achievements of the , there are many of our
compatriots who oppose...

278503.「だが ユーライザの熱意によって\n <cs_pchero>は 英雄に選ばれるこ:
But Yuliza's enthusiasm led to <cs_pchero>
being chosen as the hero... and their presence
was a miscalculation for the culprit.

278504.「犯人が用意していた 悪神の火種は ９つ。\n だから 犯人は キミを排除しよう:
The culprit had nine Fiend's Flames ready. That's why they wanted to eliminate you. And the means to do that goes beyond
physical assault...

278505.「しかし キミは 危機も悪評も 乗り越えて\n 試練の継続を 天使長にも認められ:
But you, after all the danger and notoriety, were approved by the Archangel to continue the trials. Hence, the culprit decided to change
their strategy.

278506.「つまり……キミ用の 悪神の火種を\n 用意することにしたのさ。神化の儀までにね:
In other words, They decided to prepare
Fiend's Flame for you. Before the apotheosis.
They needed time to do that.

278507.「深翠の試練で 細工をほどこし\n 試練を妨害したり……:
The Deep Green Trial, where they had
sabotaged the trial...

278508.「みそぎをおこなう 浄罪の泉を けがすため\n 魔物を 差し向けた。これらは 悪:
They sent monsters to purge the Spring of Purity where they performed the purification rituals. All of this was to buy time to make
a new Fiend's Flame.

278509.「あなたの推理が 正しいとして……\n 犯人は どうやって\n 悪神の火種を作っ:
Assuming your theory is correct... how would
you say the culprit created the Fiend's Flame?

278510.「キミたちは 見たはずだ。\n 神代の遺構にある 廃屋の中で 咲き乱れる\n 謎:
You must have seen it. Mysterious plants
blooming in abandoned houses in the Ancient
Remains.

278511.「悪神の火種……種とは よく言ったものだ。\n あの植物の種子こそ 私たちが\n:
Fiend's Flame...seeds, as they say. The seeds
of that plant are what we call Fiend's Flame.

278512.「では あの場所で 死んでいたという\n アルビデが 悪神化を仕組んだのか！\n:
So Albide, who was said to have died in that place, is the one who orchestrated the apocalypse! How in the world did he commit
such a mortal sin?

278514.「あの場所に 足しげく通っていたらしい\n アルビデは 悪神の火種を育てた\n:
Albide, who seems to have frequented that
place, is probably the one who fostered the
Fiend's Flame.

278515.「だが 神化の儀をおこなう\n 天の聖壇は 厳重に管理されている。\n 彼の立場:
But the Heavenly Altar, where the Divination Ceremony is performed, is a closely guarded place. In his position, he wouldn't have been
allowed in.

278516.「アルビデの命を糧として 悪神の火種を育てさせ\n 用済みとなった彼を見捨てて:
The real culprit...is another who used Albide's life as sustenance to grow the Fiend's Flame, abandoned him when he was no
longer needed, plucked the seed and planted it in the Divine Light Furnace.

278517.「なんと むごいことを……！ フォステイル！\n その大罪人の名を 教えてくださ:
What a terrible thing to do! Fostail! Tell me
the name of the great sinner! You already know
the name, don't you?

278518.「……その人物は 神化の儀の場でも\n 不自然な発言をしていた。:
...the person was also making unnatural
remarks at the deification ceremony.

278519.「ただちに <cs_pchero>に\n 神化の儀をおこない 神となさしめましょ:
Let <cs_pchero> be deified and made a god
immediately. Then let them go forth to defeat
the fiends.

278520.「……あれは 自分が 仕掛けておいた\n 悪神の火種によって <cs_pcher:
...It was a proposal to make <cs_pchero> a
fiend as well, by means of the Fiend's Flame
they had planted.

278521.「一連の事件の 犯人は……あなただろう？\n ヘルヴェル。:
The culprit in this series of events... is
you, isn't it? Helvel.

278523.「ヘ…ヘルヴェルお姉様が アルビデを殺し……\n 悪神化を仕組んだ 犯人？:
What...Sister Helvel is the one who killed
Albide...and orchestrated the demonic
transformation?

278524.「あっ ありえません！ だって……！\n だって お姉様は そんな方じゃない！\:
Oh, no, that's impossible! Because...! Because
she's not like that! Don't be ridiculous!

278525.「神化の儀での発言だって アストルティアへ\n 向かった 悪神を 放っておけない:
Even her statement at the deification ceremony
was based on her sense of duty to go after
fiends headed for Astoltia!

278527.「公私は わきまえよ。\n ……そう 教えたはずだ。:
You know the difference between public and
private. I taught you that.

278529.「悪神の火種の 回収任務……ご苦労だったな。\n たしかに 受け取ったぞ！:
Thank you for your efforts in retrieving
Fiend's Flame. Yes, I got it!

278530.「回収してきた 悪神の火種が暴発し\n <cs_pchero>も 悪神と化した。:
The Fiend's Flame we retrieved went off and
turned <cs_pchero> into a Fiend too. That's
what I was going to tell the Archangel.

278531.「つくづく 貴様には 予定を狂わされる……。\n しかし それも ここまでだ。:
You are really throwing me off schedule... but
that's as far as you go.

278533.<center>ナニが 英雄。ナニが 神。\nコのチカラの前でハ 赤子に等シイ。:
What is hero. What is God? In front of his
power, you are no better than a baby.

278534.<center>きサまらに 憤怒を。悔恨を。絶望を。\n憎悪の炎デ 身もココロも:
Let yourself be angry. Regret. Despair. Hatred
Fire will burn your body and soul.

278536.「そんな未来は 私たちが 実現させない。\n ……そうだろう？ <cs_pche:
We will not let that future happen. ...will
we? <cs_pchero>.

278537.「……さすがに 悪神の火種を\n ５つも 取り込んだだけのことはある。\n かく:
As one would expect from someone who has taken
in five Fiend's Flame. How can she radiate
such an illicit atmosphere?

278538.<center>なゼ あラがう。なゼ 逆ラウ。\nあノ圧倒的なチカラの前でハ き:
No, no. Your existence is futile in the
face of this overwhelming power.
Meaningless. Worthless.

278542.「審判の天使たちよ！\n ヘルヴェルを 抑えるぞ！: Angels of Judgement! We will restrain Helvel!

278544.「<cs_pchero>！\n 今こそ 神剣レクタリスを！:
<cs_pchero>! Now for the Divine Sword
Lectalis!

278546.「呪力を使い果たして 砕けたか。:
They ran out of spell power and they
shattered.

278547.「ヘルヴェル……お前が犯人だと\n フォステイルから 聞かされたときは\n 何か:
Helvel... when Fostail told me it was you, I
thought there must be some mistake...

278548.「私は 天使長と 密かに 結託していたのさ。\n 神化の儀を失敗させるなんて 芸:
I was secretly in cahoots with the Archangel.
Only an angel could have botched the
apotheosis...

278549.「誰が裏切り者かを 調べる役目は\n 私が最適だろうと 協力を申しでたんだよ。\:
I thought I would be the best person to investigate who the traitor was, so I offered to help. All the angels are suspects, so to
speak.

278550.「それにしても ヘルヴェルとは……。\n この子には 期待していたのだが。:
But still, Helvel... I had high hopes for this
girl.

278551.「ヘルヴェルの身柄は 我々が押さえておく。\n ケガを負ったユーライザは 神都に:
We will take custody of Helvel. We will take
the injured Yuliza back to the capital for
treatment.

278552.「なぜ こんな事を しでかしたのか……\n 早急に ヘルヴェルを問いただしたいが:
I'd like to question Helvel as soon as possible about why she did this, but from the looks of her, I don't think she'll wake up
for a while.

278553.「残りの悪神たち……初代勇者アシュレイと\n 盟友レオーネの消息も いまだ不明の:
The rest of the fiends...the first Hero,
Ashley, and his ally, Leone, are still
missing. It's all a bit of a headache.

278554.「だが ５人の英雄を連れもどし\n 裏切者の正体まで 突き止めた。\n 事態の収:
But you brought back five heroes and even
identified the traitor. That's a big step
forward in getting things back on track.

278555.「お前の功績を 讃えさせてくれ。\n さあ これを……。: Let me give you credit for that. Now, here...

278556.「本当に 世話になったな <cs_pchero>。\n それに フォステイル……:
You really took care of me <cs_pchero>. And
Fostail... hmm? Where's Fostail?

278557.「……神出鬼没な やつめ。まあ いい。\n 私たちは 引き上げさせてもらうよ。:
He's a wanderer. Well, that's all right. We'll
leave you to it.

278558.「俺らを 上から見下ろす 天使様のくせに\n あっさり やられちまいやがって……:
You're the angel looking down on us from
above, and you got beat up so easily... what a
bunch of slackers.

278559.「けど まあ……こっちの準備が\n ととのったのは あんたのおかげだ。\n あり:
But, well... it's thanks to you that we're all
ready to go. Thank you, Miss Helvel.

290581.「神都フォーリオンの下層 礼拝堂の北にある\n ヘルヴェルお姉様の ご自宅。その:
If you go to Helvel's home in the lower section of the city and north of the chapel, my room is on the second floor...I will see
you there.

290582.「<cs_pchero>が 天星郷に到着した直後に\n 魂の燭台を 紛失したこと:
The loss of the Soul Candle shortly after arrived in Heaven. The God Beast's transformation that took place in the
Deep Green Trials.

290583.「いいや そうではない。\n <cs_pchero>は 犯人に 襲われたんだよ。:
No, it's not. <cs_pchero> was attacked by
the culprit. As a result, they lost their
Soul Candle.

290584.「天使の間に広がる 悪意に満ちたウワサ……\n あれも キミの 四天の星巡りを妨:
The malicious rumors spreading among
Heaven... they must have been intentionally
spread to sabotage your Four Heavenly Trials.
